issue.title: [Docs] Minor issues in GLib README
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1117](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1117). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```Java
 53 See [install document][../site/install.md] for details.
```

This link is broken.

```Java
 61 % wget https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/release/arrow/arrow-0.3.0/apache-arrow-0.3.0.tar.gz
 62 % tar xf apache-arrow-0.3.0.tar.gz
 63 % cd apache-arrow-0.3.0
```

0.3.0 doesn't seem to be downloadable from dist.apache.org now. It's publishing only 0.4.1 at this time.
